channel.title: CVE Feed for MADA -- Soho Wireless Router
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MADA -- Soho Wireless Router

item.title: CVE-2017-3216|2024-08-05T14:16:28.271Z -- mada -- soho%20wireless%20router
item.description: WiMAX routers based on the MediaTek SDK (libmtk) that use a custom httpd plugin are vulnerable to an authentication bypass allowing a remote, unauthenticated attacker to gain administrator access to the device by performing an administrator password change on the device via a crafted POST request.
